name: PHCachingImageManager
desc: An object that facilitates retrieving or generating preview thumbnails, optimized for batch preloading large numbers of assets.

items.name: func startCachingImages(for: [PHAsset], targetSize: CGSize, contentMode: PHImageContentMode, options: PHImageRequestOptions?)
items.desc: Prepares image representations of the specified assets for later use.

items.name: func stopCachingImages(for: [PHAsset], targetSize: CGSize, contentMode: PHImageContentMode, options: PHImageRequestOptions?)
items.desc: Cancels image preparation for the specified assets and options.

items.name: func stopCachingImagesForAllAssets()
items.desc: Cancels all image preparation that is currently in progress.

items.name: var allowsCachingHighQualityImages: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the image manager prepares high-quality images.
